name: Qible
description:
Congratulations on your successful adoption of a Qible. We are sure your new best friend will give you much love and affection, as long as you take proper care of it. But don’t worry, we are stocked on supplies to keep your Qible happy.

-Qible Inc.

A small GameBoy styled pet game where you take care of a certain species of lizard known as a "Qible." Keep active at giving it the proper care it needs by: petting it, feeding it, decorating its enclosure, and playing games with it regularly.

WASD = D-Pad

Space = A/Select

Shift = B/Back

Press alt to enter full screen, and Ctrl with +/- for pixel perfect scaling. You can also add custom tints by putting the RGB values into the "Settings.txt" file located in "Content//SaveFiles."
